explains: vt. 征用；霸占，没收；强取

sentences.en: The government will commandeer ships only in wartime.
sentences.cn: 政府只在战争时期征用船只。

sentences.en: He decides to commandeer their room.
sentences.cn: 他决定强行占用他们的房间。

sentences.en: Commandeer unused space in your home to carve out a dedicated work space.
sentences.cn: 在你家征用一个闲置的地方，打造一个专属工作空间。
